defaultCurrency.title: Let's select your default currency
defaultCurrency.description: Selected currency will be used by default for your wishes. You can always change it in your profile settings.

dateOfBirth.title: When is your birthday?
dateOfBirth.description: Birthdays are public. You can set your birthday later in your profile settings.

profileVisibility.title: Do you want to make your wishlist public?
profileVisibility.description: Public wishlists are visible to everyone, while private ones are only visible to your friends. You can always change it in your profile settings.
profileVisibility.privateProfileOptionLabel: I want my wishlist to be private

username.title: First, let’s pick your unique username
username.description: Usernames are public. Choose wisely, as you won't be able to change it later.

reservedWishesVisibility.title: Do you want to see if your wishes are reserved by someone?
reservedWishesVisibility.description: By default this setting is turned off. If you choose to turn it on, you will see a little <badge>reserved</badge> badge next to the wishes that are reserved by someone but you won't see by whom. You can always change it in your profile settings.

fistWish.title: You are all set!
fistWish.subTitle: Now let’s create your first wish.

friends.title: Friends
friends.subtitle: Add more friends to get inspired by their wishlists and share your wishes with them
friends.reservedWishedSubtitle: Here are the wishes you reserved from your friends and other users

error.UNAUTHORIZED: Oops, you are not authorized to see this page
error.OAUTH_ERROR: Oops, an error happened while we were trying to sign you in. Please try again.
error.USER_NOT_FOUND: Oops, we were looking very hard but could not find this page... Perhaps there is a typo in the URL?
error.WISH_IS_NOT_RESERVED: Wish reservation can not be cancelled because wish is not reserved
error.WISH_IS_RESERVED_BY_ANOTHER_USER: Wish is reserved by another user
error.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TO_GENERATE_USERNAME: Too many attempts to generate username
error.CAN_NOT_UPDATE_FOREIGN_WISH: Oops, you're trying to update someone else's wish
error.UNKNOWN: An error happened but we don't know why :( Please try again.
error.persistingErrorHint: If the issue persists, please reach out to us at <email>support@mywishcraft.app</email>.

login.heading: Make your wishes come true!
login.loginAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

profile.publicWishlistEnabled: Your wishlist is <bold>private</bold>. Only your friends can see your wishes.
profile.publicWishlistDisabled: Your wishlist is <bold>public</bold>. Others can see your wishes.
profile.reservationStatusEnabled: You will see whether your wishes are reserved, but not by whom.
profile.reservationStatusDisabled: You will not see whether your wishes are reserved.

supportModal.title: Need some help or want to give feedback?
supportModal.description: If something is not working as expected, or you have a suggestion, please contact us at <email>support@mywishcraft.app</email>

deleteAccountModal.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteAccountModal.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data.
deleteAccountModal.dangerZone: Danger zone: here you can delete your account.

tabHints.active: Anyone can see your non-private active wishes
tabHints.fulfilled: Only you can see your fulfilled wishes
tabHints.archived: Only you can see your archived wishes

wishForm.reservedHint: This wish is reserved by someone else

labels.title: Title
labels.makePrivate: Toggle if the wish should be visible to you only

loginModal.title: Please sign in to continue
loginModal.description: To keep track of who reserved what we are kindly asking you to sign in. Don't worry, we won't tell @{{ username }} that it was you.
